attributes.action: Open meadow road car park in Royal Tunbridge wells
attributes.additional_details: Because it will help local businesses
attributes.background: Government needs to tell royal Tunbridge wells Borough Council to open meadow Road car park to help local business

rejection.details:
Decisions about local authority operated car parks are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can petition Tunbride Wells Borough Council directly here: https://democracy.tunbridgewells.gov.uk/meetings/mgepetitionlistdisplay.aspx?bcr=1
